meanings.definition: To give support, confidence, or hope to someone.
meanings.sent1: My teacher encourages me to do my best in school.
meanings.sent2: My mom always encourages me before a big test.
meanings.sent3: The friendly cat encourages the shy mouse to come out and play.
meanings.sent4: The warm sunshine encourages the flowers to bloom beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The kind words of a friend can encourage you to keep going.

meanings.definition: To inspire or motivate someone to do something.
meanings.sent1: Watching successful athletes encourages me to work harder.
meanings.sent2: The coach encourages the team to never give up.
meanings.sent3: The funny clown encourages the audience to laugh and have fun.
meanings.sent4: The beautiful scenery encourages artists to paint with passion.
meanings.sent5: A good book can encourage you to explore new ideas and dreams.
